name: One Unlucky Knight vs Cyborgs (Non-Stop Battle)
name_original: One Unlucky Knight vs Cyborgs (Non-Stop Battle)
description:
Description

One Unlucky Knight vs Cyborgs (Non-Stop Battle) is an action side-scolling hack n' slash game. A knight from another dimension suddenly got raided by cyborgs and trapped in endless fight!

Diversifier

Alice in Borderlands: Potion to refill Knight's HP.

Pity: Attack buff when Knight's HP is low.

Big Iron: 2D melee combat at its finest.

Controls

Arrow Keys: Move 

X: Light attack

C: Heavy attack

Z: Jump

L-Shift: Dodge/Roll

Assets

Sprites:

- https://craftpix.net/freebies/free-3-cyberpunk-characters-pixel-art/

- https://craftpix.net/freebies/free-magic-potions-pixel-art-icons/

- https://craftpix.net/freebies/free-industrial-zone-tileset-pixel-art/

- https://aamatniekss.itch.io/fantasy-knight-free-pixelart-animated-character
